website_summaries.verdict: This versatile lighted magnifying glass comes with two interchangeable heads and a lightweight and comfortable handle for easy portability.
pros: Interchange the 5x and 10x lenses as necessary
Two LED lights at the base of the handle
Lightweight and compact, so you can easily take it with you
Ergonomic grip fits easily into your hand
cons: There is a little bit of distortion toward the edges of the magnifying glass

website_summaries.verdict: We like this simple yet sophisticated design. Comes with two powerful lenses (5X and 10X magnification) that pull out and snap in as needed.
pros: The main 5X lens is large and useful for reading or hobby work
Features two LED lights for nighttime use
cons: Detaching and attaching lenses could be bothersome for some owners

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 85-year old ma. She's legally blind from the "dry" type of macular degeneration. Unfortunately, the larger glass isn't strong enough to help her much. But, in my experience, both of them magnify to a higher level than 95% or more of the competition. It the glass you're looking to buy doesn't make you pause and think "Damn--seems expensive," then, trust me, it's only a 2x or 3x strength magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: led lights quit working
customer_reviews.text: box says lifetime warranty,,,,,see no place to get warranty,,,sent email to imagniphy like paper says,,,sent back undeliverable. this is sold by amazon ,,,,so nowhere on there website is says anything about getting warrranty ,satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Wing

customer_reviews.title: Good value purchase, attentive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Missing one star for having a "halo" effect on the lens because light rays from LEDs have direct path hitting the lens. I provided the feedback to seller how to fix it easily, maybe they implement it someday. In the meanwhile just add some material like thick paper of plastic to block the rays and the halo is gone, while your desired object is still nicely illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Tomster

customer_reviews.title: Lights (LED) do not work, perid!
customer_reviews.text: Three different people attempted to place brand new sets of batteries in the device. The device's LED lights do not work, period. I find NO Reason whatsoever to buy again, nor recommend others buy this magnifying glass, period. Wish others the best of luck if and when buying.
customer_reviews.author: OldSeer

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are not clear. They seem scratched/scuffed or just poorly made. Finding the magically distance to even make them usable is difficult and the light isn't helpful if you can't look through them.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price! Highly recommended. Make sure to buy from iMagniphy for outstanding service!
customer_reviews.text: This LED magnifying glass is really great for my husband's newly found coin collection hobby. You can interchange lenses, depending on the strength of magnification you want and it is very easy to do. A "Shout Out" to the seller, Nick also! My first shipment was lost in transit and Nick went way over and above to ensure that the replacement would ship quickly and it did! As an Amazon customer for many years, he is probably the best seller that I have dealt with. Well done, Nick!
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: KRAP. This is not as powerful as they claim.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all close to 5X to 10X power. Better find a more useful product, like
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Beats all the other magnifying glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this magnifying glass and couldn't wait to write a review . It magnifies the smallest print and the handle is oh so comfortable to hold. There are two different size magnifying heads to choose from There is also a microfiber cleaning cloth and a nice soft velvet pouch to store everything in. I have never seen instructions that was so impressive like this company includes with their product. The sheet must have been about 10 x 12 inches with large colorful step by step photographs on how to install three Triple-AAA batteries. No wonder the company has a lifetime guarantee they will never have to worry about a return of this awesome, beautifully well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Read Through
customer_reviews.text: Not good! Like having extra light on reading but it’s difficult to read through. I’m not sure why, but just seems the lens is cheap quality. Also there is permanent partial circular markings on lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid recommendation
customer_reviews.text: This is a good magnifying glass. As my eyes get worse, and instruction manual print gets smaller this becomes a necessity. I haven't compared it to other magnifying glasses, but this one works well. The LED lights are bright, which helps (don't forget there are 3 batteries needed - the seller will remind you always). This came in handy on several occasions; my friend needed to see the serial number on his watch movement and it delivered. So, I keep it on my desktop for those insanely small print things that occasionally come there. Oh, a nice touch is the storage bag and the microfiber cleaning cloth. Overall, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cygnet

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service!!!!  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my 91 yr. old father for Christmas, and he loved it, but the LED lighting only worked for a few weeks. I wrote this in a previous review & iMagnify contacted me stating that this product has a Lifetime Guarantee. Today, I received their replacement! I cannot say enough about how happy this will make my father who has macular degeneration and glycoma. He loves this product and I love this company. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Williams

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Due to age and cancer meds my vision has decreased significantly so that I am unable to read small print, especially at night. My friend, who has macular degeneration, purchased this product and it has helped her dramatically. So, of course, I had to buy one.......and it has really helped!! I can now, once again, read a book at night. It is lightweight, therefore making it easy for my fingers & wrists which have some arthritis. I highly recommend this product for anyone who is having vision problems.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita W.

customer_reviews.title: This is the finest magnifier set I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the finest magnifier set I've ever seen. The lenses are easy to detach/attach to the handle, even for my 81 year old hands. The LED light is extremely bright. I wish the set had come with cloth bags to protect the lenses but the manufacturer advises me such bags will be included in sets in about a month or so. As a "workaround" I use a pair of socks. The magnifier mounted on the handle goes into one sock; the other two lenses go into the other sock, kept apart by a fold in the sock. Works great. I highly recommend this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin Jockey

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a refund. The large lens had a defect and the view was distorted from the center of the lens to the outer edge.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: A good magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a very good magnifying glass. Having two powers which can be switched out is very helpful. I use it at my computer when transcribing handwritten notes and I use the more powerful lens with my stamp collection. The battery box or place the batteries are placed is a bit flaky. It seems that it can be easily broken if not careful when changing batteries. The small springs are flimsy and the slots very tight. The light functions very well.
customer_reviews.author: eaglegrafix

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it a zero I would
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of magnifying glasses I have purchased for my mother and both after a couple of months have quit working. The light switch stops working. BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: RanBart

customer_reviews.title: Light does not work
customer_reviews.text: Light does not stay on - if it comes on at all. Tried shoring up the battery connections and the inside wiring connections. The most that would happen is the light would come on for a second or two and then nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rori

customer_reviews.title: Magnificient Product!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, bought this one for my husband but I think I'll keep it for myself. This magnifying glass is "magnificient". Magnifies clearly, comes with two lens, a cleaning cloth, a velvet-like bag, and a lifetime warrranty. The company even sent me an email to introduce me to the product, plus they are available to fix any problems encountered with the product. I felt that my purchase was well worth it and that the company really cares about their product and their customers. Will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother in June who recently had a stroke and lost some of her vision as a result. This type of product was recommended by her specialist. She absolutely loves this product and uses it everyday! Customer service from this company is outstanding!! We recently had an issue with the light not working and contacted the company. They were very nice and quickly replaced the item. Can't say enough good things about this product and the customer service we received.
customer_reviews.author: Shaebo

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Us Aging Baby Boomers
customer_reviews.text: I've discovered bifocals only go so far in reading fine print these days, so I now have two of these wonderful LED magnifying glasses around my house. They're great for reading the tiny washing instructions on garments and some of the smaller print in magazines and newspapers. I like these so much, I'm considering buying a third one to keep in my purse for reading restaurant menus. I would recommend this magnifying glass set to anyone needing to have larger print. Great quality from a good vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rapkin

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as claimed
customer_reviews.text: First, these are literally the exact same thing as the Vantasii ones. Not sure which came first. I’m not an expert, but these were disappointing as the lenses just don’t seem to be as strong as claimed (or: plan to get higher magnifications than planned). We bought them mainly to identify moths, bugs, and moth eggs and larvae. But with this brand, you will need a 15-25x lens for that. The light is useful (though too bright at times). But the more powerful lens is small, and it’s just hard to find/focus on things.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent choice. It is lightweight in the hand, making extended use possible. The magnification and illumination are great. I recommend the magnifier. When I had a question about the product, as I was inserting the batteries, I got a prompt response from the manufacturer. I thought I had a problem with it at first, but that was from something I did incorrectly. Before I could respond to him, the manufacturer put another magnifier in the mail to me and insisted I keep it! That's such a generous thing to do. He could not have been kinder, or more professional. Buy this magnifier, I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Austin reader

customer_reviews.title: An excellent magnifier but a weak switch
customer_reviews.text: I would certainly give this product five stars but after seven months use the light switch in the handle is now faulty. It comes on but only with wiggling and getting the switch in just the right position. I have always been handy in repairing things and considered getting a new switch but realized without the magnifier I couldn't do the job. Oh well. When the switch finally bites the dust completely I'll probably purchase another. It really is a great magnifier but a weak switch. Update: The company learned of my problem and shipped me a new handle overnight. I'm happy and give this five stars now.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. H. Botchford

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the iMagnify LED magnifying glass for an 86 year old friend who is suffering from macular degeneration. He could not find a good magnifying glass locally. His first use of the glass he said, "give it 20 stars." After showing him the features he absolutely loved the glass. He likes the large head for reading and the smaller head when he goes to the store. The small head allows easy carry in his pocket. I found it very well designed and solid. Great idea and excellent manufacturing. The email from the inventor was a nice touch. Highly recommend the iMagnify.
customer_reviews.author: Ross D.

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a 96 year old Father
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father-in-law who is 96 as a father's day gift. The package arrived in a timely manner and well protected as it was glass. the instructions were very clear and there were accessories contained in the box. Tried it out and the lights worked as promised and felt it was an excellent gift for people with visual problems or need to examine small details. Will definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one for myself, opened the package, installed the batteries and as soon as I tried both sizes, I ordered a second one for my parents. This item was exactly what I wanted, it is well made and lights nicely. It is easy to use and comes with a storage bag and cleaning cloth. Great Customer Service follow up, I would highly recommend this product and this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: kim pezzeti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. With so many good reviews I thought this would be perfect for my mother, but the X10 was so distorted! And changing the heads is just not easy enough for some elderly people.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Perot

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I am 74 years old and have had a need for magnification for more than 25 years. This 2 lens magnifier is a really helpful product. I have tried many devices including my $2,500 Video Eye (which is wonderful) butt it has been difficult to find a magnifier that I could use away from home. I just received my new magnifier a couple of days ago, but I can tell it will be great to keep with me for dining out and for "emergency" reading! I had a slight problem and contacted the company by email--I received a response in less than 24 hours. Great product with good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Edington

customer_reviews.title: This magnifying glass works great! The LED's make it much easier to read ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magnifying glass about a week ago. When it arrived, I found that there was a problem with the larger lens. I contacted the company on a Saturday evening, and a replacement arrived on Monday morning. This magnifying glass works great! The LED's make it much easier to read the small print that seems to get smaller with each passing week. This is a fantastic magnifying glass and is made by a company that stands behind it. Fast Shipment, great warranty. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: The Amazon Man

customer_reviews.title: ... only reviewer who didnt buy this for an elderly loved one. I use it for determining the sex ...
customer_reviews.text: I think i might be the only reviewer who didnt buy this for an elderly loved one. I use it for determining the sex of certain flowering plants. The lenses are clear, and the light is bright enough to actually see what you need to see. Changing lenses is easy. And the carry bag is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: StraightUpReviewsTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Great Manifying Glass & Great Service !
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is quite practical, and it also is built nicely.. The larger lens is very nice, and the smaller lens (with higher magnification) didn't impress me; and I'll likely not use that lens because the bigger lens does such a fantastic job. The Customer Service is fantastic! They addressed my questions/concerns promptly & professionally. I would definitely recommend the product AND this vendor. (I'd purchase from that again, in a heartbeat)
customer_reviews.author: Robert ClickmBear

customer_reviews.title: Good Magnifying Set!
customer_reviews.text: They were what I was looking for. I basically use them to read small, fine prints on labels or see details on certain things occasionally, and the LED lights provide a better view. They seemed sturdy and appeared to be in good quality thus they would probably last a long time if you do take care of them. I'd preferred them a bit lighter in weight, especially the big one hence the four stars. Bonus point: This is a family owned company so they do care about their customers' satisfaction which is hard to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: only one useful magnification
customer_reviews.text: Light is okay, the magnifying glasses are not very good, massive distortion and only small useful focus are in the center of the “lens”. The 5 power is somewhat useful, but pretty low quality for the price. The 10 power is essentially useless, extremely small central focus area with a huge amount of distortion. Not worth sending back but I wouldn’t recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: COS

customer_reviews.title: this product is great for reading the small print on labels
customer_reviews.text: For us baby boomers whose eyesight is not what it used to be, this product is great for reading the small print on labels, etc. The 3.25" diameter 5X glass works quite well for me, especially when I turn on the integral LED lights. The magnifying glass is well-protected by the surrounding plastic, the handle fits easily in my hand, and the light switch is comfortably placed for one's thumb. I like that it uses common AAA alkaline batteries. I have been using it now for about 6 months, and I have found it to be everything that I was looking for in a magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: D Mast

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate by at least two
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure when I purchase this but when I got it home got batteries in it and I really suggest on getting rechargeable batteries for the things fabulous I work... I work puzzles I do embroidery this is the best thing since peanut butter and jelly don't hesitate just buy it in fact you might want to think about to I'm going to have to order another one so I have it for the bedroom or the office
customer_reviews.author: ladyoutlaw1955

customer_reviews.title: installed the batteries and showed her how to look through it & use the lights and she loved it immediately
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who has macular degeneration. I got it and took it to her, installed the batteries and showed her how to look through it & use the lights and she loved it immediately! With the led lights, it made it so much easier for her to focus on smaller things. She is happy to see the buttons on her microwave again. This product is just what it says it is and is so easy to use and to handle. It is very easy for an older person to use as it is a lighter weight. I would recommend this product to anyone needing a good magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I thought it would be. I like the included draw string bag that you can use to throw everything into it. I also appreciated the dummy-proof instructions which explain that there are 3 batteries (not included) that you need to install. I wish all products that required assembly were that clear with the instructions. The lenses are a little difficult to change out because of the 2 buttons that you have to push on each side, but that's ok. I can now read medicine bottles that I couldn't read before.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: A solid design with great features and quality!
customer_reviews.text: For years I was using a cheap, standard style magnifying glass for working on my science and art hobbies. It got the job done, so I never put serious thought into replacing it. After some careful searching I came across this set, and I can't believe I didn't buy this years ago. The interchangeable lenses give you the entire lens to magnify with (so no smaller inset magnification). Having the option to swap out the three lenses, which I found to be a good variety, combined with the LED light on the handle makes this the magnifying glass I always wanted. Serious thought and love was put into it's design. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JASON E HATFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I purchased it for my elderly parents and they really like using the product. The light really enhances their reading experience. The batteries were very easy to install and the device itself is lightweight and not at all cumbersome. It comes with two magnifying lenses. In the past, I purchased magnifying glasses from office supply stores but the quality of this product is far superior to what I could find in the stores. Also, this product is less expensive than what I had to pay in the stores for less effective devices. If you or a family member needs some help with reading, this product is a great option. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plastic handle and lens holders are sturdy and appear to be made from high quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: I use both lenses in this set to inspect carving and engraving quality from my CNC router machine, among many other things. Here is why I gave it a 5 star rating: 1. The glass is high quality and low distortion. 2. The plastic handle and lens holders are sturdy and appear to be made from high quality plastic. 3. The LED light works well and enhances usability in poor light. This feature is worth paying extra for. 4. The unit just does the job. It works better than I had hoped, especially for the price I paid. If you need a magnifying glass of this type, I don't think you will be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: ... item is exactly as described & has been a great help to me
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described & has been a great help to me. I have recently (& hopefully, only temporarily) been experiencing vision issues-this magnifying glass provides the lights& magnification I needed. The interchangeablevlense makes taking it out with me for the day very day and the size of the larger glass makes it easy to read several words or sentences at a time -easily. Both lenses provide a clear, crisp & bright image.. I have been very pleased with this product; I feel it was fairly prices and arrived quickly. I would definitely recommend this item/ company.!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier, but glass area could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful magnifying glass that makes things bigger without distortion. My only suggestion is that you make a larger surface area. My husband likes to use it to read the paper, but says he has to move the magnifier too much; if the glass area were larger, he would be happier. He doesn't really need the light and batteries because he has a good lamp. So without the weight of the batteries, and a larger glass area, he could easily move the magnifier as he reads. I appreciate how quickly the package came.
customer_reviews.author: chyo

customer_reviews.title: My Highest Rating. Love this Product.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have purchased on Amazon. I use it all the time for reading, checking my water heater, reading small print on advertisements, and microscopic owners manual footnotes. Oddly this has also become my go to flashlight. If you turn the magnifying glass upside down it lights up the room. I love the way it fits in your hand. Note. It says inside the battery holder (3 AAA) to use 1.5 volt batteries. I have been using 1.2 volt rechargeables with no problem. I contacted the company and they said it was fine to use rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Daylight

customer_reviews.title: Magnifying plus Light a perfect combination !!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn’t think I’d need the light, but so glad I have it now. The little light makes a world of difference!! I love having the two lenses, but I’d prefer each lens as the larger size. One point down because exchanging the lenses can be a bit difficult and tricky. Otherwise, even though I have pretty good normal vision, I am constantly reaching for my magnifying glass to read all of that tiny small print on food labels and such. You won’t regret buying this. The handle is thick, so it might not be the one you want to carry around in your purse or slacks, but the magnifying plus the light makes this device a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: SocalDancer

customer_reviews.title: A superior product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These magnifying lenses really are quality lenses. The handle for the lenses is comfortable, and the battery-operated light is very helpful and perfectly positioned on the handle for best use. I've also had the opportunity to take advantage of customer service, and it is amazing. I had a question about using the most powerful of the three lenses, and I received an email response that fully answered my question within an hour. I did my research before ordering this particular magnifying glass, and I can tell you that I absolutely recommend this product both for the quality and design and also for terrific customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Don

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Despite Some Distorsion
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It works well for me. I'm 70 and my eyesight isn't what it used to be but with set I can read the tiny print on medicine bottles etc. Yes, I know there is some distortion but what do you want for $23.00. You're not going to get high quality optics at this price point. Years ago before my eyesight started to decline I paid $600.00+ for a SLR camera lens with high quality lenses. Yes, these guys could put those kind of lenses in these units but you couldn't or wouldn't pay the price they would have to charge.
customer_reviews.author: HEX 40

customer_reviews.title: Good Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the magnifying glass kit for my elderly father. I checked it out before gifting it to him. It’s a good size. It’s larger then the ones you purchase in the drugstores. Being a little bit larger makes it easier to capture what you’re viewing. The light isn’t super bright, but adequate and brighter then another off the counter one I had bought. I can’t remember if it’s a standard light or an LED. I didn’t give it 5 stars since I can’t judge how long the light will last. The additional lenses may be useful, but the main large lens should suffice 90% of the time.Has a nice bag to store everything.
customer_reviews.author: Moscanoche

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like a bona fide detective (Lol)
customer_reviews.text: I have reached that stage in my life where my glasses aren’t enough to help with my reading. So I went on the search and found these. I love them (especially) because I can select 1 out of 3 strengths. The light on the handle is a plus, along with the pouch and cloth to help wipe the lenses). I keep the glass by my bedside stand for easy excess. A bit pricey but WHEN you consider the strengths of the 3 lenses AND the light it’s a bonus. I am happy with my purchase. P.S. I had to chuckle at myself because I felt like the old detective (wearing my “ Detective hat” and cloth) searching for clues. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Minerva BryantTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, you really can't  go  wrong  with  this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I particularly like the larger 5X magnifying head. The glass is EXTREMELY sharp with a wide viewing area and no visible distortion to the outer edges. The handle is comfortable and the integrated LED lights illuminate the work area quite well. I like that a nice protective pouch and a microfiber cleaning cloth are included with this product. The only complaint I have with this magnifier is that the batteries are difficult to install in the handle. Overall this is a very good product. If your in the market for a quality magnifier you really can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in February 2019, and use it several times a week. I'm 80 years old and finally decided on cataract surgery next month. Until then, this magnifying glass has been a great help with all small print items. The LED lights come in handy, but one of them failed this October, eight months later, despite new batteries, etc. I called iMagniphy customer service, and Mary, in customer service, immediately said they would send by expedited shipping a new battery/LED light replacement compartment. So, if you're hesitant about this product, this company really does stand behind it, no questions asked. Highly recommend the product and the company. Outstanding customer service, as others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: 4th Cav Trooper

customer_reviews.title: The iMagniphy Magnifying Glass set is a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This iMagniphy magnifying glass set works great. It has a durable ABS plastic handle with LED light and 3 interchangeable glass lenses. Using the simple lens release system, you can easily change the magnification to suit any task. It makes reading books and documents a lot easier. It is also very helpful when working inside a computer case. There is a lifetime warranty on it. Another plus for this product is that iMagniphy has amazing customer service! If there are any problems, iMagniphy will immediately replace it. I am happy with this magnifying glass set and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES B. REED

customer_reviews.title: Great help for macular degeneration
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an elderly friend that suffers from macular degeneration. A regular magnifying glass didn't work well for her, but when she tried this one with the light, she was so excited to be able to see better! She was able to read her pill bottles with ease, and look at a calendar to find an appointment date. She couldn't believe how well she could see, and it brought her great relief to have this. It's an awesome magnifying glass, and at a great price too. It was delivered in a couple of days. Try it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: K. Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Received USED product
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened my package I saw that the box was already slightly opened. When I took out the magnifying glass, I clearly saw fingerprints all over the handle and it was clear as day that the item was already used. The magnifying glasses themselves seemed decent, though. I promptly returned the item, but would've probably kept it if it was NEW.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: 3 magnifiers, 1 handle; great quality lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great magnifying glasses! Love the interchangeability of the lenses which allows each lens to have a light, but I wish two smaller handles had been included so that each magnifier would have a handle. The 2.5X and 5X magnifiers are excellent and seem to be much more powerful than their numerical magnifications indicate. The 16X magnifier has a very short focal length, yet it provides a clean and clear image for close work. What makes these magnifiers so good is that the images are sharp and I don't see any chromatic aberation (colored fringes) as one often sees with cheaper magnifiers. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase and recommend these magnifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is perfect for homeschool! I looked at several others before choosing this one and I made the right choice! The light and interchangeable glass is awesome! Even my three year old begs to look at everything with this! It makes learning fun and super interesting! ~On a side note, the company was very intent on making sure we were happy with our purchase and letting us know they were there to help if we needed anything. Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Try something different
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this junk. After 3-4 hours of use over 2-3 months, the LEDs starting flickering so badly that is is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel. As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heft, balances easily with thumb and index finger; can use third finger in light contact with reading target to get the right focal distance for the lens. Don't use the light assist much, but it's a welcome addition (esp. for reading in bed). Seems like a quality product, exactly as described on Amazon. Only beef is that we wish we'd known a three-lens option were available when we ordered. Amazon only showed the two-lens set, whereas we might have wanted the three (which provides slightly more flexibility).
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnifying!! One Suggestion.
customer_reviews.text: I Really Like this magnifying glass A Lot !!! The Light is Great and the handle ,easy to hold. However, I DO have one complaint. I would Strongly suggest that you reconfigure the handle so that in has a hole at the End, so that it can be hung on a hook to make it easier to reach for. What I did was attach some Velcro to the handle, so that I could hang them up. IF this is not possible, Please supply a cloth BAG to keep it in from getting dust on them. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chifan7

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a day, and I am very impressed with it's design, and functionality. Very comfortable to use and looks to be simple to maintain. With the cloth bag that it comes with, it allows me to hang it within arms reach of my work space. It looks well made and with the lifetime warranty, this purchase should be a one time for life purchase. Unfortunately, I have searched their website for any warranty information and was only able to find (Register Warranty), so I assume it's warranty includes anything wrong is covered, scratch or cracked glass would also be included.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Just the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are really fine, and if something breaks, they will replace I Amazing company and great product. The design is great. I have tried other magnifiers, there is one that has 12 lights! However all of the lights that go around the rim, are pointed straight down, so that the middle is somewhat dark at times. This one with it 2 lights pointed right at the place where the Magnifier is magnifying works perfectly. It is quality design and construction. The smaller 10x one (using the same handle that snapps off when you push the side buttons) is great for exceptionally small print (I have macular degeneration so this is great for me and I also read a lot).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She was very pleased by the magnifying glasses features and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother in law (78) years old, who can be rather particular. She was very pleased by the magnifying glasses features and ease of use. Its not often I hear such a pleased review from her on a product. Would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah2911

customer_reviews.title: Great device with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with total unit. Had no problem inserting batteries (It takes "3" AAA, and careful to insert correct polarity + & - ) remove cover by pressing on catch at bottom of handle. Received email from vendor, before item arrived, explaining about the batteries and how to insert them. I believe that is why some reviews say lights do not work. My only minor complaint is I wish the lights were brighter or maybe a more led lights. But, it is a very good setup.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this magnifying glass...and the light is the perfect bonus. This thing really magnifies. I am so very glad I ordered it. It is not a cheap feeling magnifier...I already have a couple of those. And to top that off...who has you register a magnifier and GIVES YOU A LIFETIME WARRANTY???? iMaginifhy does! No, I don't get paid for this review or get the product cheaper. I am only doing this because this really is a great product. Period! The only thing I can find bad about it is if you look at a tiny bug...it scares the daylights out of you and you run for your life.
customer_reviews.author: LEFM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly mother. I am sending it back. The plastic is cheap and looks like it would break easily. Changing the lens and batteries would be difficult for arthritic hands. I don't know why it's rated so high.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifiers: superb service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnifier set for my father who has macular degeneration. Unfortunately, one of the lenses had fallen from the box prior to shipping. This company sent me AN ENTIRE NEW SET! What excellent service! My father especially likes the large 5X lens for reading. With the advancement of his disease, he will need to use the 16x lens or two lens at once. The lenses are clear of distortion (good optics) and much larger than most advertised magnifiers. I have bought an additional set so he has a magnifier everywhere he needs one. I strongly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this magnifying glass. Excellent clarity, nice size, and the handle is perfect for someone with arthritic hands. The lights are a nice bonus. Changing the magnifying head is easy and quick. I have several magnifying glasses that fail in one or more categories. They are either not clear enough or the magnifying head is too small and most have handles that cause my hand to ache after holding it for any length of time because the handle is too small. This company has addressed all of the inadequacies of other magnifying glasses and got it right. I can finally stop shopping for magnifying glasses.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hadam

customer_reviews.title: This is the best magnifying glass on the market for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This 5x lighted magnifying glass is perfect for those of us with failing eyesight. It is the best one that I have found on the market for reading the small print on labels, etc. The glass itself, is clear and the magnification is perfect. I have not used the separate 10x lens but I prefer the magnification to be on a separate lens as this one is, as opposed to a lens within a lens. The battery compartment is easy to access and the light switch is easy to use. I am going to purchase a few more for some of my friends who have similar, everyday needs. I would highly recommend this magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: Clear Magnification!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is fantastic! As a stamp enthusiast, magnification with some clean bright light is the gold standard/essential and this glass fits the bill! There probably won’t be too many times I’ll need to change out the magnification, but it sure is convenient when I do. Oh, and my wife likes it too for that tiny print that seems to get smaller and smaller as we get older! Thank you for a superb product!
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife as she is having trouble reading small print. Honestly - it arrived in two days - was a piece of cake to install the batteries - and my wife started using it immediately and absolutely loved it. I asked her where she was going to store it and she said "In my purse". So - not an hour after it arrived - I ordered another one to use myself. I'll set that one next to my easy chair recliner. This is really a great product and works as advertised. The light is fantastic and the optics are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: PTO

customer_reviews.title: A new look on life!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered with apprehension if honesty is placed within the words... As I have tried many and all have been a let down... But hey hey that virtual best buy needle in the haystack was finally found... This is the answer to my old eyes prayers.... It is truly a find that makes life easier when I need to read what was before unreadable.. Thank you... And to others looking ... besides the price... the quality... the fact that it really does work as needed... Well add on that this seller is not only selling what they believe in but honestly cares about the one buying it... As Mikey says... Try it you will Like It!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Handy and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnifier pair to read signatures and markings on antique items, art pieces and the teeny ingredient lists on foods. And a million other things. I didn’t realize the importance and helpfulness of the light provided on them until i actually used them. They are great magnifiers with bright lighting. They are very handy, coming in a carrying bag that’s easy to drop in a drawer. The small one is particularly handy because it’s small enough to put in a purse or large pocket so it can be taken along when shopping. I’m very happy with this purchase. These magnifying glasses ticked all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as others
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother who has macular degeneration. This was the 2nd one ordered, the first was a 5x and worked for her but she wanted one with a light. This one was a bit heavy for her and did not provide as much magnification as the much cheaper 5x that was bought, even when using the 10x magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It is (two) amazing magnifiers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior and have perfect distant vision, but poor near vision. This magnifier has been a godsend. I use the larger one daily for all sorts of things, and recently used the smaller (with higher magnification) for something that was just too small to read--the code on the back of a watch that, itself, is only 1/2 inch across. Picture is of the watch back taken with the high magnification with the light on. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs to view anything small--not just seniors, but anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MML in SC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Jigsaw puzzles quickly became a part of my covid stay at home plan. I did pretty good with the 500 piece puzzles but when I went to a 1000 piece puzzle it was hard on my eyes. So I went on Amazon to see what was available in the way of lighted magnifying glasses and settled on this one. Happy that I did and the light is even better than I imagined. My brother calls it “your old man magnifier with headlights “ but he is buying one. Paid full price and have no relationship with the seller or manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: flguy

customer_reviews.title: THESE LIGHTED MAGNIFYING GLASSES ARE A 5 PLUS!
customer_reviews.text: My mother, who has limited eyesight due to macular degeneration and cataracts, and has many magnifying devices is very happy with this 10x + 5x LED Magnifying Glass. She plans to order two more as gifts :-) My 92-year-old father-in-law, who has lost significant eyesight due to wet macular degeneration wants a set also after trying :-) A definite 5 plus!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in Used Condition
customer_reviews.text: When I received this magnifying glass set, the box had been opened, the pape work was crumpled up, and finger prints on the lenses. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: WC Fields

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever seen for reading and coin collecting.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best quality magnifier I have ever owned. As a senior, the 5X lens is large and perfect for reading fine print and even small print books! The lights illuminate perfectly and without glare. As a coin collector, the 10X lens is sharp and clear making grading coins a breeze. The lenses change easily and the cleaning cloth and drawstring bag are a nice plus. I was pleasantly surprised by the solid quality and clarity for a modest price. A fellow collector spent over $200 for a glass, but ordered one like mine after he tried it. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gladfelter

customer_reviews.title: Replacements arrived broken see pictures force broken Spring
customer_reviews.text: This is really an issue the 2nd light that I have gotten arrived broken this is a replacement arrived broken see pictures above the wire inside is not attached to the connector and I'm no mechanic I paid good money on the lightning deal I paid $17.99 with the lightning deal. Two defective units. Please accept the replacement for refund to original payment. I will find another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Married4luv

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put the two different magnifier glasses on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received it last night. It was easy to put the two different magnifier glasses on and off. and the batteries are AAA and the light is very bright. And I had to use it, I received a glass light and it has crystals that hang on the lamp and one of the had fallen off during delivery. I could barely see how it was supposed hang it back on. when I took out the new magnifying glass I was able to see there was a hole where I was to hang the crystal on. I really like it. it was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My old failing eyes need help. I am impressed with the quality and design of this product. I personally do not think I will get a lot of use of the 16x lens because of the high magnification. I am glad I have it to use on those needed occasions I like the product so much that I ordered their 2 lens set (5 & 10x lenses). With this second set I will have: 2 Handles, 1 2.5x lens, 2 5x lenses, 1 10x lens and 1 16x lens. I believe this assortment will cover most of my needs. Thanks for the great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon D. Scheske

customer_reviews.title: Create magnifiers, great value exclamation for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set. The price is very good, and the magnifying glasses work very well despite having plastic lenses. I have low vision, and I keep the tenax near me at all times. Recently I misplaced it, and I'm buying a second one because I was lost without it. So now I have to. Also in the set are a cleaning cloth and a velvet drawstring bag for keeping the lenses say from scratches. My only misgiving is that I find it tricky to insert the batteries, but you may not.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hage

customer_reviews.title: A Great Magnifying Set.  Works Very Well.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this 3 piece magnifying set today. I am approaching 70 years and managed this just fine on my own ... nothing too complicated or difficult. Switching magnifying heads and installing the 3 required batteries was amazingly simple. The light is more than adequate and easy to sitch on and off. This magnifying set comes with a nice, large, glass cleaning cloth and drawstring bag which helps keep all the parts organized together. I highly recommend this magnifying set.
customer_reviews.author: A Southpaw In TX Saved By Grace

customer_reviews.title: I've been happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with this purchase. Originally I had bought this for coin collecting but soon realized that it has many uses. I've used it while repairing a leak under our sink, reading small print, serial numbers, and even used it as a flashlight in a pinch. The only reason that I didn't rate it 5 stars is because the packaging it arrived in was horrible and there was no carrying, or storage bag. Other than that is works well, gives off a lot of light, and has been dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Pete G

customer_reviews.title: good quality glass lenses and a nice feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice objects nice design strong light a pretty good deal for the money. The battery cradle inside the handle is very flimsy so you have to be careful not to break it when loading the batteries. But once you get the batteries in you're good to go with a very nice instrument.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Light is helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so that my husband can examine sports cards that he collects. The product arrived on time. It was easy to put in the batteries and to exchange the two lenses. There was a small irregularity in the large lense. It was an oval scratch. However it is on the lower part of the lens. I debated returning it, but my husband wasn’t overly concerned about it. I guess I just like for something new to be pristine. Anyway, the light is helpful, and the magnification is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but he liked the one I gave him better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend of mine who is 86 years old, and has Macular degeneration. He already owns 2 other lighted magnifying glasses, but he liked the one I gave him better, because he said the light was brighter, which helped him to see words easier and better. He liked that it came with a carrying bag, too. The one thing that might be difficult for him to do is change out the batteries. The door to the battery compartment is a bit difficult to open for someone who doesn't see very well. But I will give it 5 stars anyway since he seemed to really like it. Nice product at a very reasonable price. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Three lenses for the price of 1 1/2. Makes this a very versatile magnifying glass (set). The large 2.5X lens is great for reading, the small 16X lens is great for close up work on projects, etc. and the medium size 10X lens covers the bases on everything else in general. The 2 LED lights are bright and well aimed at the center of the field of view no matter which lens you are using at the time. If you only have room/need/money for one glass then this is the one to buy. BECAUSE IT'S 3-N-1!!!
customer_reviews.author: TrixsterKitty

customer_reviews.title: Best magnifying glass ever!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is my workhorse! It's supper clear and very easy to hold! I love the fact that it comes with LED lights because they make the difference in many cases--so it's not just the magnification but the illumination of the object that your trying to see. I was so pleased with it that I even purchased a second one for my mom for Christmas and she loves it! Perhaps it's not the most affordable of the bunch, but it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: norbac

customer_reviews.title: My friend is very satisfied with her magnifier.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a friend who has macular degeneration and having real problems trying to read. The order came quickly, I delivered it to her home and helped her install the batteries for the lights. She used it immediately and said so much better than anything she had been using. She has mentioned a couple of times since then that the magnifier is great. She can read the small footnotes and messages in her Bible. She is definitely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I found it difficult to insert batteries in the handle's ...
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to insert batteries in the handle's compartment, which broke on my first attempt to add the batteries. I contacted the seller who immediately sent me a replacement handle. My 4-star rating is based on what i consider to be a rather poorly designed battery compartment; but I give the seller a 5-star rating for responsiveness and willingness to solve the problem I had.
customer_reviews.author: geek0130

customer_reviews.title: Your Search Stops Here
customer_reviews.text: A great glass for the value. The light really helps when reading small print. A very nice carrying bag is included. The double detachable lens is much better than those cheaper glasses that has the small 5x lens on the larger 2x lens. Now I can see the miniature disclaimers on products. If it lasts, this will be the last magnifying glass I will need. Recommended highly
customer_reviews.author: William D. Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight, the degree of magnification, the built in light the manufacturers thought of everything and even included a case. This is the third magnifying glass I have purchased and by far the best. Customer service seems to be outstanding they are extremely attentive and invite feedback. Terrific purchase
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fills a need for aging eyes
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very well-made magnifying glass, and I appreciate having a choice of two magnifying levels in one product. I have had no difficulty changing the magnifying heads. It is often hard to see clearly in dimmer light, so the built-in light of the magnifier is great. And the storage bag is a nice little extra and hopefully will keep the pieces in good condition for the long haul. Definitely recommend for times when you just need clarity on that tiny print!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: trouble with light
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these I purchased for my 93 year old father in law to help with his macular degeneration. The first one worked perfectly, but he is now having trouble with the light in the 2nd one. Not being sure how to contact the seller directly, I am posting this here in hopes they will reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, good value!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I started fiddling with the magnifying glass before I saw the instructions. I figured everything out, but thought that the imprint of the batteries inside the compartment was laughably small. Then I found the instructions, and lo & behold, they have a very nicely produced and easy-to-read guide on how to switch the lenses and put in the batteries. Kudos! Haven't seen such a clear guide in years, well printed, no typos, excellent English. Rock on!
customer_reviews.author: T Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different kinds of magnifying glasses and devices for my 93-year mother, and nothing has worked for her except this LED magnifying glass! She was so surprised when I turned on the light, it was very bright, and she could read things she'd thought she'd never see again. I also bought one for my father in law, both of whom have various degrees of macular degeneration. He was delighted with it, as well. Thank you, thank you, thank you for developing a product that actually works! Would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mlaird31

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have cataracts and even with glasses I don’t see very well. Reading, especially directions on packaging, is always a challenge. I had a couple of old magnifying glasses that were pretty useless. I finally got fed up and purchased this magnifying glass and am glad I did. I can see fine print again! The light is useful but not too bright. I really haven’t needed the more powerful lens but it’s nice to have. And the storage bag keeps everything together.
customer_reviews.author: September MorneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Performance is flawless
customer_reviews.text: The magnifying glass arrived promptly on the day it was promised. It was packaged so that it wouldn’t be scratched. Within minutes, I was using the glass and it performed flawlessly. I use it mainly to read the newspaper, and I can tell you it makes a world of difference when you can see what you’re reading. I’d recommend this product without hesitation. Sincerely, Rich Costello
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Great magnifier! My husband has optic nerve damage and doesn't see well. This magnifier allows him to read so much easier and with the enter changeable lens it is even nicer. We even got an email before it arrived telling how to put the batteries in and asking us to email them if we have any issues. It has a lifetime warranty so you just can't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked by the quality of this magnifier!!! Everything about it is SO great. From the white color to the ability to switch out the magnification to the obviously rare unbelievably attentive customer service to the well written and ILLUSTRATED directions. Wow. I could not possible ask for more. Shockingly inexpensive. Sure wish all products were like this. What a world it would be. Thank you iMagniphy.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Customer

product_meta.title: iMagniphy LED Illuminated Magnifying Glass Set. Best Magnifier with Lights for Seniors, Macular Degeneration, Reading and Hobbyists (2-Lens (10X + 5X))
feature_bullets: INSTANTLY IMPRESSED - Imagine not having to squint to read everything anymore - with 2 easily interchangeable lenses, you will be relieved when you can change the magnification you need to suit any task or hobby using the simple lens release system. iMagniphy is the genuine premium product. Comes with a carry pouch & cleaning cloth to keep your lenses smudge free.

HELP YOUR GRANDPARENTS - Imagine the look on their faces - your elderly loved ones with poor vision will praise you with thanks when you gift them this set of magnifying lenses. We receive constant great feedback from our elderly friends who are over the moon with how this improves their day to day lives. Treat your loved ones to an amazing gift today - They will love you for it!

PERFECT BEDTIME READING - Don’t wake your partner reading with the lights on at night anymore. The built in, stylish, energy efficient LED lights on the handle put out the perfect amount of light when you need to read or work in the dark. You can view everything with ease. Shine light on those hard to reach places, all while magnifying while you go. Any problems - We will replace your item, no questions asked - for life!

5 STAR VERIFIED - We have thousands of reports from customers who absolutely love this magnifier set. Perfect image quality - No struggling to read the tiny print on coupons and pill prescriptions. Now you can read everything in perfect clarity. Stamp and coin collections, reading maps, watch and computer repair and inspecting jewelry is now crystal clear under the premium glass lenses and durable ABS plastic casing. Also useful for parents or teachers inspecting their children or kids for lice.

BEAT MACULAR DEGENERATION - iMagniphy magnifiers are the perfect companion to help you enjoy your morning paper, read prescriptions and enjoy day to day life again. It's not too big, not too heavy and you can switch lenses depending on the situation.
